task.title: How to export Katalon Recorder scripts to other frameworks

taskbody.context: There are two steps to export a test case.

info.p: In Katalon Recorder, choose the test case you want to export as script, then select the Export action.

step.info: Select format from the dropdown list. You can add your own formatter.
From version 5.9.0, Katalon Recorder supports the importing and exporting of Selenium 4 projects. You can select the Selenium version and script type, then input the path to WebDriver.

step.cmd: After choose your format, click Export to export your test case.
